name: Catastrophe in Wonderful Heaven
description:
The sky city of wonderful heaven is being sieged by an army of demons. It's up to you, the guardian shooting star of the city, to rescue the angels from being devoured by demons.

(Note: you as the guardian star is basically invincible -- just focus on rescuing the angels)

Control: Mouse only. Click to dash (dashing kills demons)

Made for Mini Jam 70: Heaven. Limitation: The player has to be an inanimate object.

Kind of unfortunate I had some schedule on the last day of the jam so I had to finish this game a day early; as a result this game was quite rushed. Still wanted to polish this game a little bit more m(_ _)m

Made with Godot Engine; music was composed by myself  on the last day with purchased FL Studio 20 -- do forgive the quality of the music for I am no composer :P

Update 0.0.1 (12/28/2020 6:52AM JST): Fixed the annoyance of angel spawning too close to border, causing the angel extremely hard to rescue.
